snippet: It’s time fore a really, really interesting talk about tax reform, people! Seriously, Walter White, Olivia Pope, Captain Kirk. They’re all involved.
abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column compares Republican Rep Dave Camp to the Hobbit in that he has taken on brave quest in search of way to make tax system cleaner and simpler; notes that Camp's first effort, principled proposal that eliminated number of loopholes, was shot down by fellow Republicans; expresses bafflement that Camp responded to rebuke by making number of tax cuts permanent.
lead_paragraph: It’s time fore a really, really interesting talk about tax reform, people! Seriously, Walter White, Olivia Pope, Captain Kirk. They’re all involved.
